regions.name: Java
regions.description: People from Java, the most populous island, with diverse features. Generally medium skin tone, straight black hair, and soft facial features.

regions.name: Bali
regions.description: Balinese people, known for their unique culture and Hindu traditions. Features include light to medium skin, wavy or straight black hair, and delicate facial features.

regions.name: Sumatra
regions.description: Sumatrans, including Batak, Minangkabau, and Acehnese. Features include medium to dark skin, thick black hair, and strong facial features.

regions.name: Sulawesi
regions.description: People from Sulawesi, including Bugis, Makassar, and Toraja. Features include medium skin, wavy or curly black hair, and prominent cheekbones.

regions.name: Kalimantan
regions.description: People from Kalimantan (Borneo), including Dayak communities. Features include medium to dark skin, straight or wavy black hair, and broad facial features.

regions.name: Papua
regions.description: Indigenous Papuans, with dark skin, tightly curled hair, and strong facial features. Distinct from other Indonesian groups.

regions.name: North Sulawesi
regions.description: People from North Sulawesi, including Minahasa and Manado, often have lighter skin, straight or wavy hair, and a mix of Austronesian and European features due to historical influences.
regions.hair: black or brown, straight or wavy
